text: @devex @UN_Women A7. Innovations like the @Ladysmith Gender Data Kit have come online recently, providing tools that inform a gender-sensitive COVID-19 response. Building capacity around these tools is now a crucial next step - and will require buy-in from donors globally. #GenderData
